import {useState} from 'react' export function Dashboard(){ const [isRequestLeaveVisible, setIsRequestLeaveVisible] = useState(false); // Inside your component const [leaveType, setLeaveType] = useState("Sick Leave"); const [fromDate, setFromDate] = useState(""); const [toDate, setToDate] = useState(""); const [reason, setReason] = useState(""); const [workingDays, setWorkingDays] = useState(0); // Replace with real leave balances from props or backend const [leaveBalances, setLeaveBalances] = useState({ "Sick Leave": 5, "Casual Leave": 8, "Paid Leave": 10 }); const leaveStats = { totalTaken: 12, totalRemaining: 8, details: [ { type: 'Sick Leave', taken: 4, pending: 1 }, { type: 'Casual Leave', taken: 6, pending: 2 }, { type: 'Earned Leave', taken: 2, pending: 0 }, { type: 'loss-of-pay', taken: 10, pending: Infinity}, { type: 'loss-of-pay', taken: 10, pending: Infinity}, { type: 'loss-of-pay', taken: 10, pending: Infinity}, { type: 'loss-of-pay', taken: 10, pending: Infinity} ], }; const reporteesStats = { present: ["Alice", "David", "Eve"], absent: ["Bob", "Charlie"], }; const pendingRequests = [ { name: 'Alice', type: 'Sick Leave', date: '2025-05-22' }, { name: 'Bob', type: 'Casual Leave', date: '2025-05-23' }, ]; return (
{/* Summary Tiles */}
Leaves Taken: {leaveStats.totalTaken}
Leaves Remaining: {leaveStats.totalRemaining}
{isRequestLeaveVisible && (
setIsRequestLeaveVisible(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

Request Leave

Working Days: {workingDays}

{leaveType} Remaining: {leaveBalances[leaveType] || 0}
